Chat: See below for detailed instruction on how to use Glucose meter.
Text:
1.Plug in power adapter before taking the reading.
2.Insert test strip to the bottom of glucose meter.

3.Screen will display flashing strip indicating it is ready.

4.Hold the test strip with your blood drop till meter beeps.

5.Meter now displays your glucose reading.
